branchCategory.name: SS5YJA7, 7000 Series, Bar Stock Manifold, Individual Wiring
branchCategory.description: The SYJA3000/5000/7000 series are 4 & 5 port air operated valves with rubber seals.  The series is available in base mounted or body ported styles.
